# Praca z listami

lapply, sapply, mcapply{parallel}, tapply

```{r}

```

Map, Reduce, Filter

```{r}
cars_avg <- lapply(cars, mean)
cars[] <- Map(`-`, cars, cars_avg)
m <- lapply(1:5, function(i) matrix(runif(4),2,2))
`+`(`+`(`+`(`+`(m[[1]], m[[2]]), m[[3]]), m[[4]]), m[[5]])
Reduce(`+`, m)
Filter(function(mat) det(mat) < 0, m)
```
